Sentencas: The use of alternate cathode materials with improved performance and without any chemical reaction with adjoining electrolyte is required for a reduction in operating temperature of SOFC from 1273 K to about 1073 K (ITSOFC).
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LaCoO3 based cathode and its chemical compatibility with CeO2 based electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (ITSOFC)

Sentencas: Cobalt containing perovskite oxides such as LaCoO3 tend to exhibit a higher ionic conductivity due to a greater concentration of oxygen vacancies than other perovskite oxides.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LaCoO3 based cathode and its chemical compatibility with CeO2 based electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (ITSOFC)

Sentencas: The mixed ionic and electronic conducting cathode of the La1-xSrxCoO3-delta systems has shown the lowest cathodic overpotential for an SOFC air electrode.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LaCoO3 based cathode and its chemical compatibility with CeO2 based electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (ITSOFC)

Sentencas: In this research work, fine powders of La0.70Sr0.30CoO3-delta (LSC) cathode and Ce0.90Gd0.10O2-delta (GDC) and Ce0.80Sm0.20O2-delta (SDC) are synthesized by glycine nitrate combustion synthesis and systematically characterized by XRD and particle characteristics.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LaCoO3 based cathode and its chemical compatibility with CeO2 based electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (ITSOFC)

Sentencas: The electrical properties of LSC cathode and GDC and SDC electrolytes are also studied.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LaCoO3 based cathode and its chemical compatibility with CeO2 based electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (ITSOFC)

Sentencas: But, the crucial requirement for applicability of LSC cathode is its chemical compatibility in conjunction with the alternate solid electrolytes, GDC and SDC without any phase formation.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LaCoO3 based cathode and its chemical compatibility with CeO2 based electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (ITSOFC)

Sentencas: The XRD studies showed no reaction products when the La0.70Sr0.30CoO3-delta cathode is mixed and calcined with GDC and SDC electrolyte at 1573 K. Hence, the LSC cathode may be combined with CeO2 based electrolytes in ITSOFC application.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LaCoO3 based cathode and its chemical compatibility with CeO2 based electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (ITSOFC)
